childAltar.hintText: 3 Spiritual Stones found in Hyrule...^$0Shadow Temple...^$1Water Temple...^$2Jabu-Jabu's Belly...^$oYe who may become a Hero...&The path to the future is open...

adultAltar.hintText: An awakening voice from the Sacred&Realm will call those destined to be&Sages, who dwell in the five temples.^$8Fire Temple...^$3Forest Temple...^$4Deku Tree...^$5Spirit Temple...^$6Dodongo's Cavern...^$7Link's Pocket...^$lThe awakened ones will await&for the Hero to find %gGreg%w.^$bAnd the %revil one%w's key will be&provided by Zelda once %r5&Spiritual Stones and Medallions%w&are retrieved.^$kTogether with the Hero of Time,&the awakened ones will return&the light of peace to the world...

ganonText: I've learned this spell,&it's really neat,&I'll keep it later&for your treat!
ganonHintText: Ha ha ha... You'll never beat me&by reflecting my lightning bolts&and unleashing the arrows from&%rZora's River%w!^And even if you do, you'll never&find the legendary blade hidden in&%rBottom of the Well%w!
masterSwordHintLoc: Bottom of the Well Center Skulltula Chest
sheikText: I overheard Ganondorf say that he&misplaced the %yLight Arrows%w in&%rZora's River%w.^He also stole %gthe Master Sword%w&and hid it in %rBottom of the&Well%w.
dampeText: Whoever reads this, please enter&%rKakariko Village%w. I will let&you have my stretching, shrinking&keepsake.^I'm waiting for you.&--Dampé
gregText: By the way, if you're interested,&I saw the shiniest %gGreen Rupee%w&somewhere in%g Water Temple%w.^It's said to have %rmysterious&powers%w...^But then, it could just be another&regular rupee.&Oh well.
